doctor.description: Diagnose CLI setup and connectivity issues

api-key.description: API key to use for authentication
api-key.name: api-key

send.description: Send an SMS message (shortcut for 'sms send')

from.description: Sender phone number (optional, uses default if not set)
from.name: from

status.description: Show account status dashboard with credits, usage, and capabilities

trigger.description: Trigger a test webhook event. Sends a synthetic event to your active CLI listener.

logs:tail.description: Tail logs in real-time (like stripe logs tail)

sms:batch.description: Send batch SMS messages (uploads CSV to cloud for audit trail)

file.description: CSV file with phone numbers (and optional message text)
file.name: file

text.description: Message text (required with --to, optional with --file if CSV has text column)
text.name: text

from.description: Sender ID or phone number for all messages
from.name: from

type.description: Message type: marketing (default) or transactional. Transactional bypasses quiet hours.
type.name: type

dry-run.description: Preview batch without sending (validates access, shows cost and compliance breakdown)
dry-run.name: dry-run

reuse.description: Re-use a previous batch upload by ID (see --history)
reuse.name: reuse

sms:get.description: Get details of a specific message

status.description: Filter by status (queued, sent, delivered, failed)
status.name: status

sms:schedule.description: Schedule an SMS message for future delivery

type.description: Message type: marketing (default) or transactional. Transactional messages bypass quiet hours.
type.name: type

status.description: Filter by status (scheduled, sent, cancelled, failed)
status.name: status

examples: <%= config.bin %> webhooks create --url https://myapp.com/webhook --events message.delivered,message.failed --description "Production webhook"

events.description: Comma-separated list of events to listen for
events.name: events

mode.description: Event mode filter: all (default), test (sandbox only), live (production only)
mode.name: mode

webhooks:listen.description: Listen for webhooks locally. Receives events in real-time via WebSocket and forwards them to your local server.

forward.description: Local URL to forward events to
forward.name: forward

events.description: Comma-separated list of events to listen for
events.name: events

webhooks:test.description: Send a test event to a webhook

examples: <%= config.bin %> webhooks update whk_abc123 --description "Updated production webhook"
<%= config.bin %> webhooks update whk_abc123 --url https://newdomain.com/webhook --events message.sent --json

mode.description: Update event mode filter: all, test (sandbox only), live (production only)
mode.name: mode

examples: <%= config.bin %> templates create --name "My OTP" --text "Your code is {{code}}"
<%= config.bin %> templates create --name "Login" --text "{{code}} is your {{app_name}} login code"

templates:publish.description: Publish a draft template (locks it for use)

app-name.description: App name shown in message (defaults to your business name)
app-name.name: app-name

template.description: Template ID to use (defaults to tpl_preset_otp)
template.name: template

profile.description: Verify profile ID for preconfigured settings
profile.name: profile
